alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 29 at 4:03PM EDT until April 30 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 5 to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...West Carteret, East Carteret and Coastal Onslow Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 8 AM to 10 PM EDT Sunday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 11 AM Sunday to 5 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret
